homePageContents.quoteApp: Time to learn much about ducks!

appGoal.appGoalSubtitle: Learn the main point of the application.

appGoalContent.appGoalContentText: First of all, the application appeals to people of all ages. Especially if you like ducks, you can use this application if you want to learn more interested facts about ducks. These informations also exist on the internet, but in this app, all of these are compiled.

whyExistContent.whyExistContentText:
There are 13 reasons why I created this app, but I can explain top 5 most important reasons: 
 
-You can learn interesting facts about ducks. 
-If you are interested in ducks, this app is for you. 
-Ducks are shy beings. Without intruding on their privacy, you can learn details about them. 
-Because ducks are awesome. 
-Lastly, my girlfriends looks like duckling. That's the main reason why I created this app.

appInspiration.appInspirationSubtitle: You can see this inspiration almost everywhere in this app.

appInspirationContent.appInspirationContentText: YES! This duck is the inspiration of this app. I don't even know why it is, It doesn't even belong to me. But anyway, I like it. Did you like it?

subInspText: You can see this inspiration almost everywhere in this app.

specialSetting.activateButtonText: Who knows what's going to happen when you switch this button?

credits.creditsContent:
Big thanks those who helped me in the developing process of the app:
